name: Rest Countries App
description: A purely frontend SwiftUI app that fetches and displays country information from a public REST API (Rest Countries).

name: ToDo API
description: A RESTful API for managing to-do tasks where users can add, update, and delete tasks.

name: Personal Blog API
description: A simple REST API to create, update, and delete blog posts, using authentication for authors.

name: Weather API
description: A backend service that fetches and serves weather data using an external API.

name: User Management API
description: An API for managing user accounts, including registration, login, and profile management.

name: Blog Backend
description: A simple backend system for a blog, where users can create, edit, and delete blog posts.

name: Authentication Service
description: A simple API to handle user authentication, including sign-up, login, and token-based authentication.

name: Recipe Finder App
description: An intermediate-level app that allows users to search for recipes by ingredients, dietary preferences, and cuisine. Fetches and displays recipe details, including ingredients, instructions, and nutritional information from a public API (e.g., Spoonacular or Edamam).

name: Photo Gallery API
description: A REST API for managing a photo gallery with features to upload, categorize, and fetch images.

name: E-commerce API
description: A backend API for managing an e-commerce platform, including products, categories, and user orders.

name: Social Network API
description: A RESTful API for a social network that allows users to post, comment, like, and follow others.

name: Real-Time Chat API
description: A real-time chat application backend using WebSockets to handle instant messaging between users.

name: Blog API with Admin Panel
description: A backend blog API with an admin panel for managing users, posts, and comments.

name: Job Portal API
description: A backend API for a job portal where employers can post job listings, and candidates can apply.

name: Full-Stack Streaming Service
description: A full-stack streaming platform allowing users to upload, stream videos, and manage their profile.

name: E-commerce Platform with Admin Dashboard
description: A full-stack e-commerce website with an admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and customers.

name: Real-Time Collaboration Tool
description: A collaborative platform that supports live document editing and real-time synchronization for teams.

name: Project Management System with Task Tracking
description: A full-stack project management platform where teams can create, assign, and track tasks.

name: Event Booking System
description: A full-stack platform for booking event tickets, managing reservations, and displaying event details.
